constituent: stratum, flag, increase, formerly, horns, rice field, brains, sun, day
koohiiStory1: The strata have piled up in an ever increasing pile of dirt. As the geologists go down the rocks, they flag each stratum with the name of the corresponding era.
koohiiStory2: Archaeologists at a dig site place small flags marking layers or strata of rock. Each of these layers was formerly the top layer. (This is not increase! Hseige keeps messing up).
words:
階層(かいそう): class, level, stratum, hierarchy
一層(いっそう): much more, still more, all the more
高層(こうそう): upper
大層(たいそう): very much, exaggerated, very fine
